trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_SEQ_00<tab>Ghimthota, a captain of the watch at the Moraby Drydocks, wishes your aid in dealing with potential intruders.

TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_SEQ_01<tab>Ghimthota is convinced that a gang of treacherous pirates aims to sabotage the construction of the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var>. Speak with either Urswyrst at the front gate or C'nangho at the rear gate to learn of any suspicious activity.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_SEQ_02<tab>You have spoken with one of the guards and heard a report concerning a possible saboteur. Make your way to the cliff at Empty Heart and learn what trouble is afoot.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_SEQ_03<tab>You have confronted the suspicious sailor, and he leaves you with words that send a chill down your spine. Hurry back to the Drydocks and report to Ghimthota.

TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_SEQ_04<tab>You have succeeded in preventing the destruction of the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var>. It has come to light, however, that the leader of the pirates, Ahtzapfyn, is actually Ahtbyrm's father. Speak with the troubled foreman, and see how he fares.

TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_SEQ_05<tab>Though he puts on a brave face, it is clear that Ahtbyrm is deeply shaken by his father's unexpected appearance. Return to Ghimthota and convey Ahtbyrm's gratitude and apologies.

TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_SEQ_06<tab>Ghimthota appears convinced that a swift return to work on the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var> will soon ease Ahtbyrm's troubled heart. The watch captain thanks you for your assistance, and mentions that the would-be saboteurs have been handed over to the Yellowjackets. There has, however, been an important discovery that she would like to discuss with you.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_TODO_00<tab>Speak with one of the guards.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_TODO_01<tab>Find the shifty-eyed sailor.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_TODO_02<tab>Report to Ghimthota at the Moraby Drydocks.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Ahtbyrm.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Ghimthota.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_0<tab>I am concerned, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It appears that the pirates I had you investigate are on the move.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_1<tab>They creep ever closer to the Drydocks, so I must assume they mean to target the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var> herself.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_2<tab>That ship is the symbol of everything Limsa Lominsa strives to become, and I will not allow these base scoundrels to lay a single finger upon her hull.

TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_3<tab>We must apprehend them before they put their plans into motion! And you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, are just the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> to do it.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_4<tab>Without your capable assistance, I fear the security of the Drydocks cannot be guaranteed.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_5<tab>Not moments ago, my guards submitted reports of suspicious activity in the area. Pray begin your efforts by listening to one of their accounts firsthand.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_6<tab>It matters not whom you choose to speak with, but be sure to question either Urswyrst at the front gate or C'nangho at the rear.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_7<tab>Any suspect saboteurs you encounter during the course of your investigation are to be interrogated. Report any and all findings directly to me.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_URSWYRST_000_10<tab>Ghimthota sent you to follow up on my report?
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_URSWYRST_000_11<tab>Well, it was not too long ago that I saw some unsavory sort slinking along the top of the bluff near Empty Heart, just over yonder.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_URSWYRST_000_12<tab>It may be that he's still about. If you've got the time, adventurer, I'd much appreciate you getting up there to take a look.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_CNANGHO_000_20<tab>Hail, adventurer. Glad to have another hand aboard to help shore up security.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_CNANGHO_000_21<tab>The gods know our reports would sit on Ghimthota's desk gathering dust if it weren't for the assistance of those such as yourself.

TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_CNANGHO_000_22<tab>Speaking of reports, though, I saw one of those mangy pirates lurking around the cliff near Empty Heart. I'd take a closer look before he has a chance to cover his tracks.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_CORSAIRFOLLOWA_000_30<tab>Bah, spotted me, did ye? Well, yer too late─what's to 'appen is already 'appenin'.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_Q1_000_1<tab>Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with “Victory in Peril”?
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_A1_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_A1_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_40<tab>So, you found me one of those pirates, did you?
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_41<tab>I knew you were the right adventurer to ask for aid.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_42<tab>But what could these knaves be planning? “What's to happen is already happening”...?
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_MAELSTROM_000_43<tab>Captain! Ungh... Trouble...at the shipyard... <pant>
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_44<tab>Easy now, soldier. Who did this to you?
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_MAELSTROM_000_45<tab><pant> Pirates... Out of nowhere... <cough> Stuck me good...
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_46<tab>Gods below, we are not prepared for this!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_47<tab>The pirates, soldier, how many do they number?
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_MAELSTROM_000_48<tab>Not sure... More than I could quickly count... Seemed to be carrying...explosives...
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_49<tab>Explosives!? Then there is no time to lose!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_50<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you heard the situation. Make your way to the shipyard and engage these intruders!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_51<tab>I will see to this man's wounds, then follow after.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_52<tab>Make haste, now!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTZAPFYN_000_60<tab>Gahahaha! Never reckoned it'd be this easy! Still don't trust those slimy bastards, but their plan worked like a charm!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTBYRM_000_61<tab>Da! What are you doing, you great bloody fool!?
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTZAPFYN_000_62<tab>Shut yer trap, boy.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTZAPFYN_000_63<tab>This'll all be over soon. All that's left now is to blow this ugly pile o' driftwood into splinters.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTBYRM_000_64<tab>Why would you do such a thing!? Have you any idea how important this ship is? What it represents?
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTZAPFYN_000_65<tab>Aye, an' that's what makes it all the sweeter! Whatever it takes to knock some sense into me treacherous, backstabbin' son!

TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTZAPFYN_000_66<tab>Imagine, a boy o' <var 1A 02 /var>mine<var 1A 01 /var> givin' up the pirate life to become a shipwright! An' buildin' a bleedin' Maelstrom vessel at that! What under Llymlaen's wide, green ocean made ye take up with these self-righteous shites!?
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTBYRM_000_67<tab>You're the one with no bloody sense, Da! Don't you see? The pirates had their glory days, but that era is over!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_69<tab>Ah! I wondered why Ahtbyrm never spoke of his father. I never would have thought...
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTZAPFYN_000_70<tab>This ship's a symbol alright─of everythin' what went wrong with the world. An' I mean to shatter it into a hunnerd thousand pieces!

TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414AHTBYRM_000_71<tab>Ghimthota! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Pray beat the tar out of this bloated sea slug, and make sure no harm comes to the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTZAPFYN_000_80<tab>I...I must be gettin' old, lettin' some green 'venturer get the best o' me.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTBYRM_000_81<tab>Da...
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTZAPFYN_000_82<tab><cough> That's one big bloody ship. Big...an' nasty lookin'. Ye made that, did ye...?

TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTBYRM_000_90<tab>My thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I shudder to think what may have become of the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var> without your intervention.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTBYRM_000_91<tab><sigh> The pirates have made a right mess of things─I'd best get to sorting out the docks.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTBYRM_000_92<tab>...And my thoughts could use some sorting out as well. Ever did my father have a way of turning my life upside down.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTBYRM_000_93<tab>Pray convey my thanks─and my apologies─to Ghimthota.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_100<tab>How fare you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I cannot begin to thank you for the role you played in preventing this madness.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_101<tab>You defended more than a simple ship─you saved the budding hope of Limsa Lominsa from a violent demise. The day was yours.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_102<tab>It seems our security regimen will require much in the way of improvement if we are to truly keep the Drydocks safe.

TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_103<tab>...Ahtbyrm apologizes? Well, I suppose I can understand why he would feel responsible for his father's actions. Of all those involved, this incident was hardest on him.

TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_104<tab>But, in time, I believe he will come to a single conclusion: the most fitting way of moving past his anguish is to see the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var> completed and in the water.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_105<tab>Ah, by the by, the pirates we defeated have been handed over to the Yellowjackets. Reyner's men will be taking over the investigation.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_000_106<tab>Before the Yellowjackets moved in, however, we recovered a most unusual object. Should you have the time to spare, I would ask of you another favor...
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_QIB_TODO001<tab>Defeat the pirates and protect the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTBYRM_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Da, this is madness!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTZAPFYN_BATTLETALK_02<tab>A pirate don't abandon 'is treasures!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTBYRM_BATTLETALK_03<tab>My father... You must stop him!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_BATTLETALK_04<tab>Leave him to us. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, C'nangho, to me!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_MAMOOJA_BATTLETALK_11<tab>As we agreed, Ahtzapfyn!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_CNANGHO_BATTLETALK_12<tab>Mamool Ja mercenaries!?
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_BATTLETALK_13<tab>I'll take the Mamool Ja. You focus on Ahtzapfyn.
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTZAPFYN_BATTLETALK_21<tab>Ye've no idea who yer up against!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTZAPFYN_BATTLETALK_22<tab>Now, outta me damn way!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_AHTBYRM_BATTLETALK_23<tab>Please! You cannot let him win!
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_CNANGHO_BATTLETALK_31<tab>Ware, adventurer! Ahtzapfyn has a crazy glint in his eye...
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_GHIMTHOTA_BATTLETALK_41<tab>Protect the ship...
TEXT_SUBSEA117_00414_CNANGHO_BATTLETALK_42<tab>Captain, I...ugh...
